course_description: How do rideshare platforms set prices?How does Amazon decide on the placement of goods within its warehouses that is the size of the Amazon?This course provides a hands-on introduction to the analytics used to guide business decisions in today's data-driven economy.Leveraging the powerful decision-analytic tools in Excel, students will learn how to transform quantitative decision-making at their organizations.Notable examples of how course alums applied these tools at their jobs will be showcased.
sections: Class Nbr: 6478, Section #: 1109, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Billetdeaux, Status: Open
